about_the_game:
Get ready for an epic showdown in Trapped out! - the ultimate family-friendly action party game where chaos, fun, and laughter collide in a 3D battle arena! Engage in thrilling combat against friends and foes, both locally and online, as you strive to rack up points and emerge victorious.

Key Features:
  • Crazy Weapons and Wild Effects: Unleash the madness with an arsenal of wacky weapons! Slap your opponents silly with a giant hand, smash them with a door, or surprise them with a range of hilarious effects that will keep everyone on their toes.

  • Local and Online Multiplayer: Whether you're hosting a game night at home or challenging players from around the globe, Trapped out offers seamless local and online multiplayer action. go head-to-head in epic battles!

  • Unlockable Costumes: Express your unique style with a plethora of fun and crazy costumes. Unlock a wide variety of outfits to customize your character and stand out in the arena!

  • Family-Friendly Fun: With its colorful graphics and lighthearted gameplay, Trapped out is perfect for players of all ages. Gather your family and friends for an unforgettable brawling experience.

  • Dynamic 3D Arenas: Fight in vibrant and interactive 3D arenas that add an extra layer of excitement to each battle. Navigate Traps, find strategic advantages, and make every fight a memorable one.

Join the Battle:

Dive into Trapped out and discover a world where every fight is an opportunity for outrageous fun and endless laughter. Are you ready to brawl your way to the top?

Add Trapped out to your wishlist now and prepare a whole lot of fun!
